attributes.action: amend current burial law to include Promession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A truly green choice.
Promession is an environmentally sensitive alternative to standard burial and cremation that should be available to all. 
Promession would allow for burial in a wider choice of resting places, whilst dramatically minimizing our environmental impact on our most precious resources; our air, water, and soil. 
Using liquid nitrogen, Promession gently reduces the body to its most simple form by removing all water (70% of body) and metals (eg. medical, dental) in a clean and respectful non-burn process. The remains can then be buried in the living topsoil and will be restituted to earth within 6-12 months 
A stone or marker may be placed at the gravesite and if a tree or bush is planted, new life will grow from the nutrients released from the remains beneath. Promessed remains may also be kept in an urn as a keepsake or they can be readied for scattering, in a clean mini-cremation.

Promession is the only true environmentally friendly alternative to burial and cremation.
